newsitem.title: UK: UBS leads 795 million stg four-tranche bond.
newsitem.headline: UBS leads 795 million stg four-tranche bond.

text.p: Leek Finance No 1 Plc has issued a 794.6 million sterling four-tranche floating-rate bond, lead manager UBS said.
The bonds are backed by a pool of UK residential mortgages.
TRANCHE A1
AMT 262.9 MLN STG BASE *3M-LIBOR LEG MAT 19.DEC.37
FEES 10 BP MARGIN +7 BP AVG LIFE 1.26 YRS
S&P AAA ISS PRICE PAR PAY DATE 19.DEC.96
NOTES *TO DECEMBER 2002 THEN 3M-LIBOR +20 BP THERE AFTER.
TRANCHE A2
AMT 428.6 MLN STG BASE *3M-LIBOR LEG MAT 19.DEC.37

S&P A ISS PRICE PAR PAY DATE 19.DEC.96

TRANCHE B
